chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
X: Type
n: nat
i: nat
f: nat -> X

Goal:
fun2vec i n (fun j : nat => f (S j)) = fun2vec (S i) n f

Premises:
fun2vec : nat -> forall n : nat, (nat -> X) -> vec X n
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
fun2vec_id : forall (i n : nat) (f : nat -> X), fun2vec i n f = vec_set_pos (fun p : pos n => f (i + pos2nat p))
VectorSpec.eta : forall v : vec ?A (S ?n), v = VectorDef.hd v ## VectorDef.tl v where ?A : [X : Type i : nat n : nat f : nat -> X |- Type] ?n : [X : Type i : nat n : nat f : nat -> X |- nat]
caseS' : forall (v : vec ?A (S ?n)) (P : vec ?A (S ?n) -> Type), (forall (h : ?A) (t : vec ?A ?n), P (h ## t)) -> P v where ?A : [X : Type i : nat n : nat f : nat -> X |- Type] ?n : [X : Type i : nat n : nat f : nat -> X |- nat]
VectorDef.caseS' : forall (v : vec ?A (S ?n)) (P : vec ?A (S ?n) -> Type), (forall (h : ?A) (t : vec ?A ?n), P (h ## t)) -> P v where ?A : [X : Type i : nat n : nat f : nat -> X |- Type] ?n : [X : Type i : nat n : nat f : nat -> X |- nat]
VectorSpec.splitat_append : forall (v : vec ?A ?n) (w : vec ?A ?m), VectorDef.splitat ?n (VectorDef.append v w) = (v, w) where ?A : [X : Type i : nat n : nat f : nat -> X |- Type] ?n : [X : Type i : nat n : nat f : nat -> X |- nat] ?m : [X : Type i : nat n : nat f : nat -> X |- nat]
pos_S_inv : forall p : pos (S ?n), (p = pos0) + {q : pos ?n | p = pos_nxt q} where ?n : [X : Type i : nat n : nat f : nat -> X |- nat]
VectorEq.cast : vec ?A ?m -> forall n0 : nat, ?m = n0 -> vec ?A n0 where ?A : [X : Type i : nat n : nat f : nat -> X |- Type] ?m : [X : Type i : nat n : nat f : nat -> X |- nat]
VectorSpec.append_splitat : forall (v : vec ?A ?n) (w : vec ?A ?m) (vw : vec ?A (?n + ?m)), VectorDef.splitat ?n vw = (v, w) -> vw = VectorDef.append v w where ?A : [X : Type i : nat n : nat f : nat -> X |- Type] ?n : [X : Type i : nat n : nat f : nat -> X |- nat] ?m : [X : Type i : nat n : nat f : nat -> X |- nat]
VectorDef.map2 : (?A -> ?B -> ?C) -> forall n0 : nat, vec ?A n0 -> vec ?B n0 -> vec ?C n0 where ?A : [X : Type i : nat n : nat f : nat -> X |- Type] ?B : [X : Type i : nat n : nat f : nat -> X |- Type] ?C : [X : Type i : nat n : nat f : nat -> X |- Type]
vec_map2 : (?A -> ?B -> ?C) -> forall n0 : nat, vec ?A n0 -> vec ?B n0 -> vec ?C n0 where ?A : [X : Type i : nat n : nat f : nat -> X |- Type] ?B : [X : Type i : nat n : nat f : nat -> X |- Type] ?C : [X : Type i : nat n : nat f : nat -> X |- Type]
VectorDef.fold_right2 : (?A -> ?B -> ?C -> ?C) -> ?C -> forall n0 : nat, vec ?A n0 -> vec ?B n0 -> ?C where ?A : [X : Type i : nat n : nat f : nat -> X |- Type] ?B : [X : Type i : nat n : nat f : nat -> X |- Type] ?C : [X : Type i : nat n : nat f : nat -> X |- Type]
VectorDef.fold_left2 : (?A -> ?B -> ?C -> ?A) -> ?A -> forall n0 : nat, vec ?B n0 -> vec ?C n0 -> ?A where ?A : [X : Type i : nat n : nat f : nat -> X |- Type] ?B : [X : Type i : nat n : nat f : nat -> X |- Type] ?C : [X : Type i : nat n : nat f : nat -> X |- Type]
VectorSpec.append_comm_cons : forall (v : vec ?A ?n) (w : vec ?A ?m) (a : ?A), a ## VectorDef.append v w = VectorDef.append (a ## v) w where ?A : [X : Type i : nat n : nat f : nat -> X |- Type] ?n : [X : Type i : nat n : nat f : nat -> X |- nat] ?m : [X : Type i : nat n : nat f : nat -> X |- nat]
VectorSpec.uncons_cons : forall (a : ?A) (v : vec ?A ?n), VectorDef.uncons (a ## v) = (a, v) where ?A : [X : Type i : nat n : nat f : nat -> X |- Type] ?n : [X : Type i : nat n : nat f : nat -> X |- nat]
VectorSpec.take_O : forall (le : 0 <= ?n) (v : vec ?A ?n), VectorDef.take 0 le v = vec_nil where ?A : [X : Type i : nat n : nat f : nat -> X |- Type] ?n : [X : Type i : nat n : nat f : nat -> X |- nat]
vec_map_set_pos : forall (X Y : Type) (f : X -> Y) (n : nat) (s : pos n -> X), vec_map f (vec_set_pos s) = vec_set_pos (fun p : pos n => f (s p))
VectorDef.nth_order : vec ?A ?n -> forall p : nat, p < ?n -> ?A where ?A : [X : Type i : nat n : nat f : nat -> X |- Type] ?n : [X : Type i : nat n : nat f : nat -> X |- nat]
VectorDef.fold_left : (?B -> ?A -> ?B) -> ?B -> forall n0 : nat, vec ?A n0 -> ?B where ?A : [X : Type i : nat n : nat f : nat -> X |- Type] ?B : [X : Type i : nat n : nat f : nat -> X |- Type]
VectorDef.fold_right : (?A -> ?B -> ?B) -> forall n0 : nat, vec ?A n0 -> ?B -> ?B where ?A : [X : Type i : nat n : nat f : nat -> X |- Type] ?B : [X : Type i : nat n : nat f : nat -> X |- Type]
VectorDef.map : (?A -> ?B) -> forall n0 : nat, vec ?A n0 -> vec ?B n0 where ?A : [X : Type i : nat n : nat f : nat -> X |- Type] ?B : [X : Type i : nat n : nat f : nat -> X |- Type]
vec_plus = fun (n : nat) (v w : vec nat n) => vec_set_pos (fun p : pos n => (v#>p) + (w#>p)) : forall n : nat, vec nat n -> vec nat n -> vec nat n Arguments vec_plus {n}%nat_scope
VectorDef.take : forall p : nat, p <= ?n -> vec ?A ?n -> vec ?A p where ?A : [X : Type i : nat n : nat f : nat -> X |- Type] ?n : [X : Type i : nat n : nat f : nat -> X |- nat]
VectorDef.replace_order : vec ?A ?n -> forall p : nat, p < ?n -> ?A -> vec ?A ?n where ?A : [X : Type i : nat n : nat f : nat -> X |- Type] ?n : [X : Type i : nat n : nat f : nat -> X |- nat]
VectorDef.trunc : forall p : nat, ?n > p -> vec ?A ?n -> vec ?A (?n - p) where ?A : [X : Type i : nat n : nat f : nat -> X |- Type] ?n : [X : Type i : nat n : nat f : nat -> X |- nat]
VectorDef.shiftrepeat = fun A : Type => @VectorDef.rectS A (fun (n : nat) (_ : vec A (S n)) => vec A (S (S n))) (fun h : A => h ## h ## vec_nil) (fun (h : A) (n : nat) (v : vec A (S n)) (H : (fun (n0 : nat) (_ : vec A (S n0)) => vec A (S (S n0))) n v) => h ## H) : forall (A : Type) (n : nat) (v : vec A (S n)), (fun (n0 : nat) (_ : vec A (S n0)) => vec A (S (S n0))) n v Arguments VectorDef.shiftrepeat {A}%type_scope {n}%nat_scope

```coq
intros.
rewrite fun2vec_id.
rewrite fun2vec_id with (i := S i) (n := n) (f := f).
f_equal.
extensionality p.
rewrite <- plus_n_Sm.
reflexivity.
Qed.
```

original: intros. rewrite fun2vec_id. rewrite fun2vec_id with (i := S i) (n := n) (f := f). f_equal. extensionality p. rewrite <- plus_n_Sm. reflexivity.
